Articles.Content:
So, I am making a mod for kopernicus, and everything except one moon so far was going well. So I did a tiny change to the config of the moon, and suddenly the entire mod doesn't work! Module Manager picked them up, but the planets didn't load. There was no log for the planets, just one log naned "kopernicus.log". This is what it says:


//=============================================================================================================////=====  Kopernicus 0.0.9 - (BuildDate: 15.06.2015 17:37:57; AssemblyHash: DixZ/hc1EVGE1wmsTcoV6AVcOHc=)  =====//
//=============================================================================================================//
[LOG 08:09:37]: Logger "Kopernicus" was created
[LOG 08:09:37]: Injector.OnDestroy(): Complete
[LOG 08:09:37]: Running namechange pass.
[LOG 08:09:37]: [Kopernicus]: RuntimeUtility Started
[LOG 08:09:37]: StarLightSwitcher.Awake(): Begin

Does anybody know what happened? Can somebody help? It's not working at all! I can't continue developing my mood if this persists. ;.;
Kopernicus doesn't need templates anymore. It can literally create planets from scratch now.
so it doesn't even try to load things with templates? woah...
